p: A detailed statistical analysis plan will be prepared and ratified by the DSMB. Stata, SAS (SASÂ® version 9.4 software (SAS Institute Inc., Cary, NC, USA)) or R (R Core Team (2017). R: A language and environment for statistical computing. R Foundation for Statistical Computing, Vienna, Austria. URL https://www.R-project.org/) will be used for analysis and all code recorded for the purposes of ensuring reproducible research.
